          <title>
            <string language="hu">Uri standard, Kr. e. 26. század, British Museum</string>
            <string language="en">Uri standard, the 26th century BC, British Museun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Uri Standard, das 26. Jahrhundert BC, britisches 
Museun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Norme d'Uri, le 26ème siècle BC, Museun 
britannique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Padrão de Uri, o 2õ século BC, Museun 
britânico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Standard di Uri, il ventiseiesimo secolo BC, 
Museun britannico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπα Uri, ο 26$ος αιώνας Π.Χ., βρετανικό 
Museun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estándar de Uri, el vigésimo sexto siglo A.C., 
Museun británico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A koradinasztikus uri sírból előkerült hangszerdoboz háború oldala</string>
            <string language="en">The war side of the music box found in an early dynastic grave of Ur</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fametszet,  magasnyomás,  dúc,  </string>
            <string language="en">woodcut, highpress (or letterpress),  block,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kriegseite des Musikkastens fand in einem 
frühen dynastischen Grab von Ur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le côté de guerre du cadre de musique a trouvé
dans une tombe dynastique tôt d'Ur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O lado da guerra da caixa da música encontrou em
uma sepultura dynastic adiantada de Ur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il lato di guerra della casella di musica ha 
trovato in una tomba dynastic in anticipo di Ur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πολεμική πλευρά του κιβωτίου μουσικής που βρίσκεται
σε έναν πρόωρο δυναστικό τάφο Ur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cara de la guerra del rectángulo de la 
música encontró en un sepulcro dynastic temprano de Ur</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">woodcut, highpress (oder Hhhochhdruck), Block,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gravure sur bois, highpress (ou impression typographique), 
bloc,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">woodcut, highpress (ou letterpress), bloco,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">woodcut, highpress (o scritto tipografico), blocco,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ξυλογραφία, highpress (ή letterpress), ομάδα 
δεδομένων,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">woodcut, highpress (o prensa de copiar), bloque,</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
